 2003-00742003-01-30,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the COLLISION REGULATIONS (MANOEUVRING AND WARNING SIGNALS - CANADIAN MODIFICATIONS AND BLUE FLASHING LIGHT) by exempting certain ferries from the requirement to emit a prolonged blast signal upon departure and by allowing vessels operated by the Canadian Coast Guard Auxiliary to exhibit a blue flashing light as an identification signal when involved in a search and rescue operation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0041 Publication Date: 2003-02-12
